en: This mode's air attack is best against groups of Light air units.
cn: 该模式下的雷神更擅长对付成群的轻甲空中单位

en: Build a Bunker with 4 Marines inside.
cn: 建造一个内有4好兄弟的地堡

en: Build a Barracks. Each turn it sends 2 Marines.
cn: 建造一个兵营，每回合该兵营都会生产两名机枪

en: Build a Factory. Each turn it sends 1 Hellbat.
cn: 建造一个重工，每回合该重工都会生产一个火车侠

en: Build an Engineering Bay. Until destroyed, it gives your biological units +15% damage and +1 armor.
cn: 建造一个工程站。直至被毁，它能为您所有生物单位提供+15%的攻击以及+1护甲

en: Deal 1500 damage to the toughest enemy unit.
cn: 选择敌对最肉的单位并对其造成1500点伤害

en: Detect all enemy cloaked units and structures for 1 turn. Draw a card.
Launch 6 Seeker Missiles at clusters of enemy units.
cn: 选择6个敌对单位并对各个被选单位发射猎杀飞弹

en: Your biological units lose 10% of their life, gain Rush, and get +50% attack and movement speed for 2 turns (doesn't stack).
cn: 你所有生物单位立刻冲锋且失去10%的生命，并获得持续两回合的+50%攻速，移速buff（不叠加）

en: They enter siege mode upon sighting an enemy.
They burrow in your defensive area.
They prioritize repairing injured mechanical units and structures.
cn: 它们能修理受损的机械单位及建筑

en: They unload 8 defensive Marines each, then help evacuate retreating tactical units.
cn: 每个运输机各在自己防守区投下8个机枪后协助战术单位后撤

en: Build a Supply Depot. When it is destroyed, discard the cheapest card from your hand. Launch: Draw 2 cards.
Build a Sensor Tower, which is a long-ranged detector.
cn: 建造一个感应塔，该塔具有长距反隐能力。

en: Build a Refinery. Until destroyed, it increases your gas limit by 1. Launch: Add 2 Vespene Barrels to your hand.
cn: 建造一个气矿，直至被毁，它能增加1点瓦斯产能上限。战吼：在你手中生成两张瓦斯罐牌。

en: Build a Starport. Each turn it sends 1 Viking (Fighter Mode).
Deal 1500 damage to the highest value enemy structure.
Double the production of your two highest value Barracks, Factories, or Starports. (Only one attachment can be added to each structure).
Deal 800 damage to the toughest two biological enemy units.
cn: 选择两个最肉的敌对生物单位并对其各自造成800点伤害

en: They target the center of the map with their anti-ground mode.
cn: 这些解放将会对着地图中间使用架设模式

en: They each unload 4 Marines and 2 Marauders near the enemy defensive area.
cn: 各自在敌对防守区附近投下4机枪和2光头哥

en: They each unload 1 Siege Tank on the cliff, which enter Siege Mode.
cn: 各自在高地投下一个自动架设的坦克

en: Build 2 Missile Turrets and 1 Bunker. The Siege Tank enters Siege Mode in your defensive area.
Build a Fusion Core. Until destroyed, it increases the energy regeneration rate of your units and halves their ability cooldowns.
cn: 建造一个聚变核心。直至被毁，它能增加你单位的回蓝效率并减半技能冷却

en: Build an Armory. Until destroyed, it gives your mechanical units +15% damage and +1 armor.
cn: 建造一个军械库，直至被毁，使你的机械单位+15%伤害+1护甲

en: Recover 2 structure cards from your discard pile.
Launch a Nuke at the enemy defensive area. It lands after a delay of 1 battle phase.
cn: 朝敌对防守区发射一枚核弹，该核弹在下回合着陆

en: Make your two lowest value Barracks, Factories, or Starports produce Marauders, Siege Tanks, or Banshees. (Only one attachment can be added to each structure).
Launch: It deals 1500 damage to the toughest enemy unit.
cn: 战吼：选择最肉的敌对单位并对其造成1500点伤害

en: When killed, add 2 Thor cards to your hand.
cn: 亡语：在你手中生成两张雷神牌

en: Each turn the Commander sets the mineral cost of a random unit card in your hand to 0.
Launch: Add 2 Nova Ops cards to your hand.
cn: 战吼：在你手中随机生成两张诺娃装备牌

en: Until killed, it increases your hand size by 1 (max 12). Launch: Draw a card.
cn: 直至阵亡，该单位能增加你的手牌上限1（最多12）。战吼：抽一张牌

en: They spawn burrowed in your defensive area, and immediately unburrow.
cn: 这些单位在你的防守区以埋地形态生成，并立刻出地

en: Build a Spawning Pool. Each turn it adds a Zergling Spawn card to your hand.
cn: 建造一个血池。每回合在你手中生成一个跳虫卵牌

en: Build a Roach Warren. Each turn it adds a Roach Spawn card to your hand.
cn: 建造一个蟑螂巢。每回合在你手中生成一个蟑螂卵牌

en: Build a Hydralisk Den. Each turn it adds a Hydralisk Spawn card to your hand.
cn: 建造一个刺蛇巢。每回合在你手中生成一个刺蛇卵牌

en: Give your biological ground units +40% attack speed and +60% movement speed (doesn't stack).
cn: 让你场上所有生物地面单位获得+40%攻速和+60移速的buff（不叠加）

en: Give your ranged biological ground units +6 damage and +3 range (doesn't stack).
Your biological structures fully heal and gain the ability to spread creep.
cn: 你所有生物建筑立刻恢复所有生命值，并使其获得扩散菌滩的能力
这些单位只能活两回合

en: Launch: Reduce your gas income by 1.
cn: 战吼：减少你的瓦斯产能1点

en: They burrow in your defensive area, then every other turn they send 2 Locusts each.
cn: 在防守区埋地，并在之后的每个回合中各自生产两个蝗虫

en: Each turn they use Corrosive Bile on the nearest enemy structure (at any range).
cn: 各自每回合无视距离限制对最近的敌对建筑使用太阳轰炸

en: They have upgraded speed. Launch: Draw a card.
cn: 这些单位拥有移速升级。战吼：抽一张牌

en: Until killed, it spreads creep and increases your hand size by 1 (max 12). Launch: Draw a card.
cn: 直至阵亡，该单位会扩散菌滩并提升手牌上限1（最多12）。战吼：抽一张牌

en: Launch: Combine all of the free Spawn cards in your hand into one Spawn card, then double the unit count on the combined card.
cn: 战吼：把你手中所有免费的虫卵牌结合为一张并将其中的单位翻倍。

en: They burrow when retreating, and only unburrow once they move out again.
cn: 后撤时埋地移动，当它们再次出击时才会出地

en: It has detection and follows cloaked units. Enemy units won't attack it without detection. Launch: Draw a card.
cn: 该单位会变形并跟随敌对隐身单位。除非被侦查，该单位不会被敌军主动攻击。战吼：抽一张牌

en: Until killed, it increases your hand size by 1 (max 12). Launch: It uses Contaminate on the 3 highest value enemy structures, disabling them for 2 turns.
Build a Baneling Nest. Each turn it adds a Baneling Spawn card to your hand.
cn: 建造一个爆虫巢穴，每回合在你手中生成一张爆虫卵牌

en: Build a Spire. Each turn it adds a Mutalisk Spawn or Corruptor Spawn card (chosen randomly) to your hand.
cn: 建造一个飞龙塔。每回合在你手中随机生成一张飞龙卵牌或腐化卵牌

en: Build an Extractor. Until destroyed, it increases your gas limit by 1. Launch: Draw a card.
cn: 建造一个气矿。直至被毁，它能增加你瓦斯上限1点。战吼：抽一张牌

en: Build an Evolution Chamber. Until destroyed, whenever you play an Evolution Card give all of your units +10 life and draw a card.
cn: 建造一个进化腔。直至被毁，每当你打出一张进化卡抽一张卡并让你所有单位+10生命

en: Combine all of the free Spawn cards in your hand into one Spawn card, then triple the unit count on the combined card.
cn: 把你手中所有免费虫卵牌结合为一张，并使其单位翻三倍

en: Each turn they each create a Creep Tumor.
cn: 每回合这些虫后各自产下一个菌滩肿瘤

en: They burrow upon sighting an enemy, and attack while burrowed.
cn: 接敌后埋地，并只能在埋地状态下攻击

en: They spawn burrowed in the enemy defensive area, and immediately unburrow and attack.
cn: 这些单位以埋地状态在敌对防守区生成，并立刻出地攻击

en: Each turn they Abduct stationary and defensive enemy units.
They each drop 4 Banelings on the enemy defensive area.
cn: 他们各自在敌对防守区空投4毒爆

en: Build an Ultralisk Cavern. Each turn it adds an Ultralisk Spawn card to your hand.
cn: 建造一个牛塔。每回合在你手中生成一个牛卵牌

en: Build a Nydus Network. Until destroyed, your ground units have Rush and emerge from it when played.
Mutate one of your Spires into a Greater Spire. Each turn it adds a Brood Lord Spawn card to your hand.
cn: 让你的一个龙塔变异为大龙塔。每回合在你手中生成一张大龙卵牌

en: Morph 24 Zerglings, 12 Roaches, 6 Mutalisks, 6 Corruptors, and 3 Hydralisks into their upgraded forms.
Take control of the toughest enemy unit for 1 turn. Other enemy units don't attack back.
cn: 选择敌对最肉单位并获得其控制权一回合。期间敌人不会反击该单位

en: Launch: Combine all of the free Spawn cards in your hand into one Spawn card, then make the combined card Heroic.
Each turn she adds a Hive Mind card that you don't already have to your hand (if possible).
Launch: If this is the only card you played this turn, draw a card.
cn: 战吼：如果这是你本回合唯一打出的牌，抽一张牌

en: They use Psionic Transfer when retreating.
Launch: Add 2 Warp In cards to your hand.
cn: 战吼：在你手中生成两张折跃牌

en: Build a Gateway. Each turn it sends 1 Zealot.
cn: 建造一个传送门。每回合生成一个狂热者

en: Build 3 Shield Batteries. Launch: Fully restore the energy on all of your Shield Batteries.
Build a Pylon. Launch: Draw a card, then add a Warp In card to your hand.
cn: 建造一个水晶塔。战吼：抽一张牌，然后在你手中生成一张折跃牌

en: Damage clusters of enemy units with 9 Psionic Storms.
cn: 选择9个敌对单位集群并对其使用灵能风暴

en: Send Phoenixes to lift 12 enemy units with Graviton Beam. The Phoenixes leave if their target is destroyed.
cn: 召唤12个凤凰各自选择敌对地面单位并对其使用举高高。当目标被摧毁时凤凰离开战场

en: Add 1 to your mineral income. If it's already at your limit, draw a card and add Crystallized Energy to your hand instead.
Create 10 Stasis Wards in your defensive area.

cn: 战吼：各自使用幻象技能

en: Fetch a structure card. If you have none, draw a card instead.
cn: 检索一张建筑牌。如果没有，则抽一张牌

en: Launch: Make all of your units on the battlefield defensive.
cn: 战吼：让你场上所有单位变成防御单位

en: Launch: Permanently reveal all enemy cloaked units and structures.
They use Psionic Transfer to teleport across the center of the battlefield.
cn: 他们各自使用灵能传送直接传送至战场中央

en: They each leave after killing 1 unit or structure.
cn: 他们各自在获得一杀后离开战场

en: Build a Stargate. Each turn it sends 1 Phoenix.
cn: 建造一个星门。每回合生产一个凤凰

en: Build a Forge. Whenever you play a structure card, it sends a Probe to build a Photon Cannon.
cn: 建造一个段炉。每当你打出一个建筑牌，该段炉会派遣一个探姬并建造一个光炮

en: Build a Cybernetics Core. Whenever one of your biological Protoss units dies, it grants a 50% chance to revive it as an aggressive Stalker.
cn: 建造一个控制芯核。每当你的神族地面单位死亡，该建筑都有50%的概率将其复活为一个进攻的追猎者

en: Build an Assimilator. Until destroyed, it increases your gas limit by 1. Launch: Increase your gas income by 1.
cn: 建造一个气矿，直至被毁，增加你瓦斯上限1点。战吼：增加你瓦斯产能1点

en: Build a Twilight Council. Each turn it shuffles the most expensive card that you can't afford from your hand back into your deck. Whenever it does, draw a card.
cn: 建造一个光影议会。每回合该建筑会将你手里最贵的且支付不起的牌洗回卡组，如果成功则抽一张牌

en: Drain all energy from enemy units that have energy, then deal 200 damage to them.
cn: 清空所有敌对能量单位的能量，并对其各自造成两百点伤害

en: Your team's Xel'naga Keystone gains an attack for the rest of the game. If it already has one, give it +15 damage and +15 range for 1 turn instead.
cn: 你队伍的钥石获得buff，使其在本局剩余时间内获得攻击能力。如果钥石已经有该buff，则使其在一回合内额外获得+15伤害+15射程。

en: Upgrade your 2 cheapest Gateways to Warp Gates, which add Warp In cards to your hand each turn. If you have no Gateways, add 2 Warp In cards to your hand instead.
cn: 升级你的两个最便宜的传送门为折跃门，该折跃门每回合在你手中生成一张折跃牌。如果没有传送门则生成两张折跃牌到你手中

en: Launch: All of your High Templar and Dark Templar merge into Archons with Rush.
cn: 战吼：使你所有受控的隐刀或电兵冲锋并合体变为白球

en: They each unload 2 Zealots, 1 Adept, and 1 Stalker near the enemy defensive area. Launch: Add 2 Warp In cards to your hand.
cn: 各自在敌对防守区附近投下2叉1使徒1追猎。战吼：在手牌中生成两张折跃牌

en: Build a Robotics Facility. It has 1 mineral upkeep. Each turn it sends 1 Immortal.
Build a Fleet Beacon. Each turn it fetches a card that sends a Carrier or Tempest. If the fetch succeeds skip your next draw step.
cn: 建造一个舰队航标。每回合检索一张航母或者风暴牌，如果检索成功则跳过你的下个抽牌阶段

en: Build a Templar Archives. Whenever you play an action card that costs 8 or less, it shuffles that card back into your deck instead of discarding it.
cn: 建造一个文献馆。每当你打出一个少于或等于8费的动作牌，该建筑会使那些动作牌不会被丢弃而是返回卡组

en: Build a Dark Shrine. Each turn it converts a biological Protoss unit from a card in your hand into a Dark Templar.
cn: 建造一个隐刀塔。每回合该建筑会选择你手牌中的一个神族生物单位，并使其转化为隐刀

en: Create a Vortex at the center of the battlefield that lasts for 10 seconds. Units that enter it are destroyed.
cn: 在地图中心释放一个持续10秒的黑洞，黑洞会吞噬所有进入它的单位（包括友军）

en: Copy the lowest cost unit card in your hand.
cn: 复制你手牌中最低费用的单位卡

en: Each turn he chooses a mechanical unit and adds a copy of the card that created it to your hand. Whenever this succeeds, skip your next draw step.
cn: 直至死亡，每回合他随机选择场上的机械单位并在你的手上添加一张创建它的卡的复制。若复制成功，则跳过你的抽牌阶段。

en: Launch: Reveal the most expensive card in each of your opponents' decks.
cn: 战吼：揭示敌方队伍卡组最高费卡

en: Each turn he fetches a Heroic unit card. If the fetch succeeds skip your next draw step.
Launch: Add a Mothership card to your hand, unless you already have one there.
cn: 战吼：除非你手上已有变形妈妈船动作卡，向你的手牌中添加变形妈妈船

en: This mode's air attack is best against Massive air units.
cn: 这个模式的雷神适合对付重甲空军

en: Deal 1000 damage to the toughest biological enemy unit. If alive, Nova equips her Canister Rifle and does the same.
cn: 对最肉的敌方生物单位造成1000伤害。如果诺娃还存活，诺娃将装备她的筒式步枪并释放一次伤害为1000的狙击

en: Launch: If alive, Nova equips her Hellfire Shotgun (does splash damage but only targets ground).
cn: 如果诺娃存活，诺娃装备她的地狱火枪（有溅射伤害，但只对地）

en: Permanently cloak the units that you send this turn. If alive, Nova permanently cloaks too.
cn: 永久隐形这回合你召唤的单位，如果诺娃存活，诺娃也永久隐形

en: Disable all enemy structures with value 2 or less for 2 turns. If alive, Nova disables the highest value enemy structure too.
If alive, Nova permanently gains detection.
cn: 如果诺娃存活，诺娃永久获得侦测能力

en: If alive, return Nova to your hand. Otherwise, shuffle a copy of Nova from your discard pile into your deck.
cn: 如果诺娃存活，将诺娃返回到你的手牌，否则，将一张诺娃的复制牌塞入你的卡组

en: All of your units except Kerrigan and Overlords become aggressive and gain Rush.
All of your units except Kerrigan and Overlords become defensive and gain Rush.
All of the Zerglings, Banelings, Roaches, Hydralisks, and Ultralisks you send this turn unburrow at the center of the map.
cn: 你本回合召唤的所有狗毒爆蟑螂刺蛇牛在地图中央出地

en: Upgrade your Mothership Cores into tactical Motherships. Each turn reduce this card's cost by 1 mineral. If your last Mothership Core dies, discard this card.
cn: 将你的萝莉船变形为妈妈船，每回合这张牌的晶矿费用减1，如果你的最后一个萝莉船死亡，丢弃该牌

en: They only attack non-Keystone structures with a special grenade attack.
cn: 他们只会用特制炸弹攻击非钥石建筑

en: Add Scanner Sweep, MULE, and Supply Drop to your hand.
cn: 在你的手牌中生成太阳拳，矿骡和奥术愚蠢

en: It unloads 20 Marines in the enemy patrol area. If your deck is empty, upgrade this card to send 3 Hercules Dropships.
cn: 用载有20个机枪的大力神向敌方防守区空投机枪，如果你的卡组空了，升级这张卡改为召唤三个大力神

en: Launch: It deals 1500 damage to the toughest enemy air unit.
cn: 战吼：对敌方最肉空中单位造成1500伤害

en: They attack from the cliff, and have upgraded speed and cliff-jumping.
cn: 他们从高地上进攻，升级了移速和跳跃悬崖的能力

en: Build an Infestation Pit.  It grants a 99% chance to revive your slain Infested units as Infested Civilians.
They use burrow to retreat. Launch: Reduce your gas income by 1.
cn: 埋地后撤。战吼：减少你的一点瓦斯产能

en: They have 50% life and no shields.
cn: 他们只有50%生命且没有护盾

en: They have +10 range, but can only attack non-Keystone structures.
Fetch a card with \"Chrono\" in the name (other than Chrono Probe). If you have none, draw a card instead.
cn: 检索一张名字中含有“时空”的卡，如果没有，则抽一张牌

en: Build 1 Photon Cannon for each structure you control.
cn: 你每控制一个建筑，建造一个光子炮台

en: When killed, return it to your hand.
cn: 亡语：生成一张不死鸡猎到你的手牌

en: Launch: Shuffle 1 Riot card into your deck.
Launch: Add a Xenomorph Research card to your hand.
cn: 战吼：向你的手牌添加一张异形研究卡

en: Build a Factory. Each turn it sends 1 Vulture.
cn: 建造一个重工，每回合生产一秃鹫

en: Send 6 Vultures to place 3 Spider Mines each near the center of the battlefield.
cn: 召唤6个秃鹫，每个秃鹫会在战场中心埋3个蜘蛛雷，秃鹫埋雷后离开

en: Use Irradiate on 3 enemy biological units. It deals damage over time to them and other nearby enemy biological units.
cn: 对三个敌方单位使用辐照，会对他们和附近的敌人生物单位造成伤害

en: Draw 3 cards. Then shuffle 3 Riot cards into your deck.
cn: 抽三张牌，向你的卡组中塞入三张叛乱牌

en: Launch: Add 2 Xenomorph Research cards to your hand.
cn: 战吼：向你的手牌中添加两张异形研究牌

en: Launch: Give all of your non-Commander units Rush and make them aggressive.
Build a Research Facility. Each turn it adds a Xenomorph Research card to your hand.
cn: 建造一个异形研究所，每回合向你的手牌中添加一张异形研究卡

en: Reduce the cost of all Confederate cards in your hand by 2 minerals and 2 gas. Shuffle 2 Riot cards into your deck.
cn: 缩减你手牌中的所有联邦牌的晶体和瓦斯费用2点，向你卡组中塞入两张叛乱牌

en: Make your two cheapest Factories produce Goliaths. (Only one attachment can be added to each structure).
cn: 从你无挂件的重工中选择两个最便宜的为其配备挂件并使其生产歌莉娅（每个建筑只能配备一个挂件）

en: Launch: Add a 22nd Reinforcements card to your hand.
cn: 战吼：向你手牌中添加一张22师增援部队

en: Build a Ghost Academy. It gives your Ghosts and Spectres +3 range and prevents enemy card effects from choosing them as targets.
cn: 建造一个幽灵军校，使你的幽灵和幽魂射程加3并防止其成为敌对卡牌的目标

en: Build a Barracks, Bunker, and Missile Turret. Launch: Destroy all of your other structures and discard all structure cards from your hand.
Launch 1 Nuke at the enemy defensive area and 1 at the battlefield center (they land after 1 battle phase). Shuffle 4 Riot cards into your deck.
cn: 在敌对防守区和地图中间各自发射一枚在下回合引爆的核弹，向你的卡组中塞入四张叛乱牌

en: Discard up to 3 Riot cards from your deck. For each card discarded send 6 aggressive Marines with Rush.
When killed it drops 4 Marines, 1 Goliath, and 1 Heroic Siege Tank.
Launch: Discard a random Heroic card from one of your opponents' decks.
Launch: Discard all Confederate and Riot cards from your hand. Send 20 Marines for each card discarded.
cn: 战吼：丢弃你手牌中的所有联邦牌和叛乱牌，每丢弃一张召唤20机枪

en: Build a Sunken Colony. Launch: If you have no Sunken Colonies on the battlefield, add a copy of Sunken Colony to your hand.
cn: 建造一个潜隐菌落。战吼：如果你场上没有潜隐菌落，在你的手牌中生成一张潜隐菌落

en: Give your biological air units +100 life (doesn't stack).
cn: 使你的生物空中单位+100生命（不叠加）

en: Give your biological ground units +3 armor (doesn't stack).
cn: 使你的生物地面单位+3护甲（不叠加）

en: At the start of the next Play Phase, add 10 Zerglings to each Spawn card in your hand.
They each increase your hand size by 1.
cn: 各自增加一点手牌上限

en: They each unload 2 Hydralisks and 4 Zerglings near the enemy defensive area.
cn: 各自在敌方防守区空投2刺蛇4小狗

en: Build a Spire. Each turn it adds a Mutalisk Spawn or Scourge Spawn card (chosen randomly) to your hand. Launch: Reduce your gas income by 1.
cn: 建造一个龙塔，每回合向你的手牌添加一张飞龙卵牌或爆蚊卵牌。战吼：缩减一点瓦斯产能

en: Destroy a random enemy structure, then 8 Zerglings and 2 Hydralisks unburrow from underneath it.
cn: 随机摧毁一个敌方建筑并召唤8狗2刺蛇出地攻击

en: Set the energy (current and maximum) of your biological energy units to 400 and give them +100 life (current and maximum).
At the start of the next Play Phase, add 3 Hydralisks and 1 mineral cost to each Spawn card in your hand.
Launch: Play all cards from your hand that send only air units, and discard the rest.
cn: 战吼：打出你手牌中所有仅召唤空中单位的牌，摧毁剩余的

en: Build a Creep Colony. Launch: Draw a card. If you have no Creep Colonies on the battlefield, add a Creep Colony to your hand.
cn: 建造一个菌毯菌落。战吼：抽一张牌，如果你场上没有菌毯菌落，向你的手牌添加一张菌毯菌落

en: At the start of the next Play Phase, add 1 Ultralisk, 1 mineral cost, and 1 gas cost to each Spawn card in your hand.
cn: 在下一个出牌阶段开始时，向你手牌中的每个卵牌加1牛和一点晶矿瓦斯费用

en: Shuffle an Infestation card into each of your opponent's decks.
cn: 向你每个对手的卡组中塞入一张“敌对的渗透者”牌

en: Each turn this card updates to have 6 Zerglings, 2 Mutalisks, or 1 Hydralisk per enemy unit with energy.
cn: 每回合刷新召唤物，敌人每有一个能量单位随机从6狗2飞龙1刺蛇中选择一项召唤

en: Replace your team's KeyStone with the Overmind. Each turn it adds a random Spawn card to your hand, then doubles that card's unit count.
cn: 用主宰替代你队伍的钥石，每回合随机产生一张虫卵牌并翻倍其召唤物

en: When killed, shuffle a Torrasque Revival card into your deck.
cn: 亡语：向你的卡组中塞入一张托雷斯克复活牌

en: Launch: Reduce your mineral and gas income by 1 each.
cn: 战吼：缩减你的1点瓦斯和水晶产能

en: Each turn that you play no unit or structure cards, add 2 Zealots to this card.
They try to leave the battlefield when they retreat, and return to your hand if successful.
cn: 在后撤时离开战场， 每成功撤退一个棍子在你的手牌中生成一张1/0棍机卡。

en: Build 2 Pylons. Launch: Fully restore the shields and energy of all of your structures.
cn: 建造两个水晶塔. 战吼：变更你建筑当前的护盾及能量为该建筑的上限

en: Build a Gateway. Launch: Fetch your least expensive unit card. If the fetch succeeds skip your next draw step.
Cloak all of your ground units for 1 battle phase.
cn: 你的地面单位全部隐身一回合。

en: Launch: All of your units on the battlefield become aggressive and gain Rush.
Stun 2 clusters of enemy units with Stasis Field for 30 seconds. Affected units are invulnerable while stunned.
The Carrier has 1 mineral upkeep. Each turn that you play no unit or structure cards, add 1 Scout to this card.
Launch: Fetch your most expensive action card.
Build 3 Shield Batteries. Launch: Fully restore the shields on all of your units and fully restore the energy on all of your Shield Batteries.
Recall all of your non-stationary units to your spawn area and fully restore their shields. Then make all of your units on the battlefield defensive.
Disable all enemy structures for 1 turn. They are invulnerable while disabled.
cn: 冻结所有敌方建筑一回合，使其失效，冻结期间建筑无敌。

en: Give up to 24 of your biological Protoss units Recall Suits, which revives them as Dragoons when they die (overrides the Cybernetics Core revival effect).
cn: 使你至多24个神族生物单位获得亡语：复活成为龙骑士。（不叠加并且优先级大于控制核心）

en: Each turn that you play no unit or structure cards, add 1 High Templar to this card. Launch: They use Psionic Storm on clusters of enemy units.
You can only play this card if every unit you control is cloaked.
cn: 只有你控制的每个单位都是隐形单位时你才能打出这张卡。

en: Build a Robotics Bay. Until destroyed, ignore 2 mineral and 2 gas upkeep.
Send an invulnerable Mothership to use Planet Cracker, dealing massive damage to ground units and moderate damage to structures.
cn: 派出一个无敌的妈妈船使用行星碎裂炮横穿整个战场，对所有地面单位照成巨大伤害。（包括己方）

en: Discard 5 unit cards that send ground units from your deck. Add 1 to your mineral income. If it's already at your limit, draw a card and add Crystallized Energy to your hand instead.
When killed, add Fenix Reborn and 2 Warp Ins to your hand.
cn: 当该单位死亡时，将菲尼克斯重生和2张折跃援军加入你的手牌中。

en: It has 1 mineral upkeep. Each turn that you play no unit or structure cards, reduce the cost of this card by 1 random resource.
Launch: Play the most expensive action card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.
Each turn this is in your hand, a random opponent sends 2 Marines. Play this card to quell the riot and draw a card.
cn: 打出这张牌时抽一张牌，只要这牌在你的手牌中，每回合你的一个随机敌人将额外召唤两个机枪兵

en: Calldown 10 Marines per Commander you control. Discard this card if your last Commander dies.
Send 4 Vultures to place 3 Spider Mines each in your defensive area. They leave the battlefield afterwards.
cn: 召唤4个秃鹫，他们会分别将3枚蜘蛛雷埋入你的防御区内，然后离开战场。

en: Launch: Discard all Riot cards from your hand, then draw a card for each one discarded.
cn: 战吼：丢弃当前手牌中全部的叛乱牌，每成功丢弃一张叛乱牌，则中抽一张牌。

en: Give the units you play this turn Rush.
Deal 500 damage to the toughest enemy unit.
cn: 对最肉的敌方单位造成500伤害

en: Detect all enemy cloaked units and structures during the next battle phase.
Use Irradiate on 2 enemy biological units. It deals damage over time to them and other nearby enemy biological units.
cn: 对两个敌对随机生物单位使用辐照，期间会对附近敌对生物单位持续造成伤害（没有友伤）

en: Each turn this is in your hand, an opponent sends 4 Zerglings and 1 Hydralisk. Play this card to clear the infestation and draw a card.
cn: 每当它出现在你的手牌中的时候会给随机一名对面4张跳虫和1只刺蛇，打出这张牌可以解决渗透并且抽一张牌

en: Make your highest value Factory or Starport produce Thors or Battlecruisers. Discard your cheapest 2 cards for each produced, or destroy Physics Lab if you can't.
Replace all cards in your deck that send only Zerglings with random cards that send only Banelings.
cn: 把你卡组中只召唤狗的牌替换为只召唤毒爆的牌

en: The number of Archons on this card is equal to your unspent gas (minimum of 1).
cn: 这张卡的召唤数量等于本回合中没有使用的剩余瓦斯数量。（最少召唤1个）

en: Launch: Discard your hand. Channel 10: Add 6 Void Army cards to your hand.
cn: 战吼：丢弃你的所有手牌 钥石幽能 10：向你的手牌中添加6张虚空大军的阴影卡

en: Launch: Reduce the cost of all Hybrid and Void cards in your deck and hand by 1 gas.
cn: 战吼：减少你手牌和牌库中所有混合体和虚空牌的一点瓦斯消耗。

en: When selected gain 1 gas. When played add Spectre Cell to your hand.
Add Defensive Matrix to your hand. Then reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 mineral.
cn: 在你的手牌中生成一张防御矩阵，然后减少你手牌中所有卡牌的一点矿物消耗。

en: Launch: Recover 1 card with the \"buried\" keyword from your discard pile.
Recover 3 cards with the \"buried\" keyword from your discard pile.
Build a Psi Disruptor. Until destroyed, it prevents each enemy player from spending 1 of his or her minerals.
cn: 建造一个灵能干扰器，直至被摧毁，每回合都将消耗所有对手的一点晶体矿

en: Use Defensive Matrix on your toughest 6 units. Defensive matrix expires after preventing 200 damage or after 2 battle phases.
cn: 对你最肉的6个单位使用能量护盾，护盾持续2回合可以抵消200伤害。

en: Build a Bunker. Then shuffle a Secret Hangar into your deck.
cn: 建造一个地堡，然后向你的卡组内洗入一张秘密机库牌。

en: Add random Hybrid cards to your hand until you have 7 cards.
cn: 向你的手牌内添加混合体牌，直到你具有7张手牌为止。

en: Disable the weapons and abilities of the 3 toughest enemy units for 1 turn. Targets mechanical and psionic units only.
cn: 对3个最肉敌对机械单位使用干扰矩阵，禁用敌方武器和技能一个回合。

en: Until killed, draw an extra card each play phase.
cn: 该单位存活时，每回合你可以额外抽取一张牌。

en: Channel 5: It sends 5 Seeker Missiles at clusters of enemy units.
cn: 钥石幽能 5：该单位以敌对单位群为目标发射5枚猎杀飞弹

en: Deal 1500 damage to the toughest two enemy units.
cn: 对敌方最肉的两个单位各造成1500伤害

en: Build a Supply Depot. When it is destroyed, discard the cheapest card from your hand. Launch: Add Interference Matrix and Irradiate to your hand.
They cloak when they move out.
cn: 他们会在出场时使用隐身技能。

en: Play two random unit cards that cost 4 or less resources from your hand. Then draw a card.
Play the most expensive unit card from your hand. Then draw a card.
Play the least expensive unit card from your hand. Then draw a card.
Channel 4: It immediately spawns inside and destroys a random enemy structure.
cn: 钥石幽能 4：立即出现在一个随机敌方建筑中并摧毁它。

en: Launch: It gains +10 life for each of your infested units that died this game, to a maximum of +3000 life.
Replay one of each Evolution from your discard pile.
cn: 使用你的弃牌堆中的每一个不重复的进化卡。

en: The number of Zerglings on this card is equal to the number of units you control.
cn: 这张牌的跳虫数量等同于你当前控制单位的数量（每回合刷新，且宠物不算）

en: Implant 2 Broodlings into each of your units, which are released upon death (doesn't stack).
cn: 为你的所有生物单位添加一个亡语：每当自己死去后，将会生成2只巢虫。（不叠加）

en: If you play an Evolution card they morph into Ravagers.
cn: 如果你打出一张进化卡它们进化为破坏者

en: If you play an Evolution card they morph into Guardians or Devourers (each chooses randomly).
cn: 如果你打出一张进化卡它们随机进化为守护者或吞噬者

en: It increases your hand size by 1. If you play an Evolution card it morphs into an Overseer that uses Contaminate on the 3 highest value enemy structures.
They have upgraded speed and focus their attack on structures.
cn: 它们已经升级了移速而且强制攻击建筑

en: Build a Mutation Chamber. Each turn it morphs one of your Roaches, Hydralisks, Mutalisks, or Corruptors into the upgraded form.
cn: 建造一个进化腔，在每个回合开始时，随机选择一只蟑螂刺蛇飞龙腐化进行进化.

en: Set your income limit to 6 for both minerals and gas. Channel 1: Add 1 to your gas income. If it's already at your limit, draw a card and add Crystallized Energy to your hand instead.
The number of Stalkers on this card is equal to your unspent gas (minimum of 1).
cn: 此卡上的追猎者数量等于本回合未使用的气体（最少1个）。

en: When killed it drops 2 Dark Templar.
cn: 当被消灭时掉落两个隐刀

en: Copy 1 random unit card from an opponent's deck. Channel 2: Copy 2 instead. The copied cards have no race.
cn: 随机选择敌对卡组中的一张牌，将其复制并生成到你手中， 钥石幽能  2 ：更改为两张。复制的牌属于虚空牌

en: Channel 4: They each destroy the highest value enemy structure that costs 4 or less.
Disable the highest value enemy structure for 1 turn. It is invulnerable while disabled. Add a copy of Enduring Stasis to your hand.
Shuffle all unit cards that send mechanical units from your discard pile back into your deck, then add 1 to their mechanical unit counts.
Supplicants count as your weakest units even if other units you control have less life and shields.
cn: 死徒永远被视为你最弱的单位，即使你控制的其他单位的血盾和更少

en: Sacrifice your weakest ground unit to Ascend your toughest ground unit that is not yet Fully Ascended. Repeat 3 more times.
Channel 5: Steal 750 life/shields worth of enemy units (rounded down), starting with the weakest.
Each turn he sacrifices your weakest ground unit to fully restore his energy and Ascend (even if he is already Fully Ascended).
Cast 2 Psionic Orbs. They move across the entire battlefield doing moderate damage to nearby enemy units.
cn: 施放2个灵能球，穿过战场并对附近的敌军单位造成伤害。

en: Upgrade your cheapest Stargate into a Warp Stargate, which adds Star Warp cards to your hand each turn. If you have no Stargates, add 2 Star Warp cards to your hand instead.
cn: 把你最低费用的一个星门升级为折跃星门，每回合给你一张星际折跃卡。如果你没有星门，给你两张星际折跃卡

en: Build a Stargate. It has 1 gas upkeep. Each turn it sends 1 Void Ray.
Build an Argus Crystal. Launch: Lock the most expensive unit card in an opponent's hand. It can't be played until your last Argus Crystal is destroyed.
cn: 建造一个阿古斯水晶，战吼：直至被摧毁，锁定一个对手手牌中的最高费单位牌，使其不能被打出

en: Build a Pylon. Launch: Draw a card, then increase your Keystone's energy by 3.
cn: 建造一个水晶塔。战吼：抽一张牌，然后增加你的钥石三点能量

en: Until killed, add a Terrazine Canister to your hand each play phase.
cn: 直至死亡，每回合向你的手牌中生成一个地嗪罐

en: Deal 1500 damage to the two highest value enemy structures.
Build a Starport. Each turn it sends 1 Wraith.
cn: 建造一个机场，每回合生产一怨灵

en: They use Tactical Jump to warp to the enemy defensive area.
cn: 他们出场时使用战术折跃来跳到敌人的防御区。

en: Give your team's biological units +50% life (doesn't stack).
cn: 使你队伍的生物单位+50%生命（不叠加）

en: Add a Shakuras Patrol to your hand. For each powered structure you control (including Pylons), it sends 1 Dragoon, Dark Templar, or Scout (chosen randomly).
cn: 向你的手牌中添加一张萨古拉斯巡逻队，你每有一个充能的建筑或水晶塔，从一龙骑，一隐刀，一棍机中随机获得

en: They have 50% life and no shields. This card has Heroic as long as you control 10 or fewer units.
If you control at least 4 energy units at the start of the play phase, upgrade this card.
cn: 如果你至少控制4个能量单位，升级这张卡

en: They attack from the cliff. The Hydralisks spawn burrowed and wait 1 turn before unburrowing.
cn: 从高地上进攻，刺蛇会以埋地状态出生并在一回合后出地

en: Each turn add 1 Zergling to this card for each energy unit you control.
cn: 每回合你每控制一个能量单位就向这张牌中添加一个跳虫

en: They spawn inside the highest value enemy structure, destroying it.
The Dragoon adds a Hero Warp card to your hand each turn. The Commander gives your team's Heroic units +15% damage and +1 armor.
Launch: Add a Repair Station card to your hand.
cn: 战吼：向你的手牌中添加一张修理站

en: Launch: Remove detection from all enemy units and structures (even if they're not visible to you).
cn: 战吼：移除所有敌方单位和建筑的侦测能力（即使它对你不可见）

en: Launch: If you have a Terran unit, give Duran +40 damage. If you have Zerg, give him rapid life regeneration. If you have Protoss, give him permanent cloaking.
cn: 战吼：如果你控制了人族单位，加40攻击，如果你控制了虫族单位，获得快速回血的能力，如果你控制了神族单位，杜兰永久隐形

en: For each energy unit you control, shuffle a Slave Broods card into your deck.
cn: 你每控制一个能量单位，向你的卡组中塞入一张奴隶巢群

en: Remove detection from 3 random enemy detectors (even if they're not visible to you).
cn: 移除随机三个敌方侦测单位的侦测能力（即使它对你不可见）

en: Build a Bunker, a Missile Turret, and 2 Sunken Colonies. Each turn, reduce the cost of this card by 1 mineral if you control 2 or more energy units.
The Battlecruiser moves across the battlefield while firing and leaves upon reaching the enemy Keystone.
cn: 战列巡洋舰会从钥石出发到移动攻击另外一边的钥石后进行折跃离开

en: Until destroyed, it gives all players +1 mineral income. When this card is selected, gain 3 minerals.
cn: 在被摧毁之前，它给予所有玩家1点矿物收入（包括对手）。当这张卡被选中时，获得三点矿物

en: Build a Raider's Cache. Until destroyed, it gives your team's Heroic units +15% damage and +1 armor.
Each player on your team draws a card. Prevent players on your team from discarding due to drawing past their hand limit until after the next draw phase.
Launch: Add 1 Goliath to every UED unit card in your hand.
cn: 战吼：向你手牌中的所有UED单位卡添加一个歌莉娅

en: Launch: Add 1 Wraith to every UED unit card in your hand.
cn: 战吼：向你手牌中的所有UED单位卡添加一个怨灵战机

en: Launch: Discard 2 random non-Confederate cards. Then draw a card for each one discarded.
cn: 战吼：随机丢弃两张非联邦牌，每丢弃一张抽一张牌

en: Deal 1500 damage to 4 random enemy structures with value 2 or less. Add a Vespene Barrel to your hand.
Deal 1500 damage to the highest value enemy structure with value 6 or less. Then shuffle two Battlecruisers into your deck.
Launch: Send 2 Marines per UED card in your discard pile.
Add two Slave Broods cards to your hand.
cn: 向你的手牌中添加两个奴隶巢群

en: Build a Barracks and a Bunker. They have 30% life.
cn: 建造一个兵营和一个地堡，它们只有30%的生命而且很燃

en: Your biological units heal 10 life per second for 2 turns (doesn't stack).
This card has Heroic as long as you control 10 or fewer units.
This card has Heroic and Rush as long as you control 10 or fewer units.
Launch: Add Stimpack, Combat Drugs, and Neurostim Drugs to your hand.
cn: 战吼：向你的手牌中添加神经药物，兴奋剂，战斗药剂

en: Target all enemy cloaked, burrowed, and energy units with an EMP blast, which permanently suppresses cloaking and permanently removes all energy.
cn: 用EMP攻击所有敌人的隐形、埋地和能量单位，这些单位会永久失去暴露并失去蓝条

en: Draw 2 cards. Then order your 6 weakest units to leave the battlefield (only targets units that are not already leaving).
cn: 命令你最弱的6个单位离开战场（只针对尚未离开的单位）。你每命令三个单位就抽一张牌。

en: Give your team's biological units +3 damage (doesn't stack).
cn: 你队伍中的所有生物单位加3攻击（不叠加）

en: You can only play this card if you control a unit with energy.
cn: 你只有在控制能量单位时才能打出该牌

en: Launch: Ensnare all enemy cloaked and burrowed units for 1 turn, revealing them and reducing their movement speed.
cn: 战吼：对所有敌人的隐形单位和埋地单位释放诱捕，暴露它们并降低它们的移动速度一回合。

en: Give your burrowed and cloaked units double damage (doesn't stack). They keep the bonus even if they unburrow or lose cloaking.
cn: 使你的埋地和隐身单位伤害翻倍（不叠加），即使它们不再处于隐形或埋地状态也不会失去该buff

en: They spawn burrowed in your defensive area and wait 1 turn before unburrowing.
cn: 它们在你的防守区以埋地状态出生，并在一回合后出地

en: Kill all of your non-Zerg units. For each unit killed, send 1 Ultralisk, 1 Guardian, 3 Hydralisks, 5 Mutalisks, or 15 Zerglings (chosen randomly).
cn: 杀死你的所有非z单位，每杀死一个单位，从1牛，1守护者，3刺蛇，5飞龙，15狗中随机选择一项召唤

en: They spawn burrowed near the center of the battlefield and wait 1 turn before unburrowing.
cn: 它们在战场中央以埋地状态出生，并在一回合后出地

en: Each turn set the units on this card to match the burrowed units you control.
cn: 每回合将这张牌上的单位重置为你控制的所有埋地单位

en: Launch: All of your Lurkers unburrow and move forward (they reburrow again once in sight of a target).
cn: 战吼：命令你的所有潜伏者出地并前进，接敌时埋地

en: Launch: Discard the 5 cheapest unit cards from your hand. Give the Zergling +300 life, +1 armor, and +10 damage per card discarded.
cn: 战吼：丢弃你手牌中的最便宜的五张单位牌，每丢弃一张给狗王加300生命1护甲10攻击

en: Steal a Heroic card from an opponent's deck (chosen randomly) and add it to your hand.
Launch: Infect the highest value enemy structure with a plague that deals 1500 damage over 2 turns. Reduce your gas income by 1.
Discard the cheapest unit card from your hand. Your biological energy units restore 50 energy per second for 1 turn (doesn't stack).
Destroy a random enemy air unit with detection. Then 15 Scourge burst out of that dying unit.
cn: 摧毁一个随机敌方空中反隐单位，并从中孵化15个爆蚊

en: Deal 1000 damage to the toughest enemy ground unit and spawn 18 Broodlings at it. The Broodlings die after 2 turns.
Build a Lurker Den. Each turn it adds a Lurker Spawn to your hand if you control no Lurkers, and each turn it orders one of your Lurkers with no targets in range to unburrow and advance.
cn: 建造一个潜伏者巢，如果你场上没有潜伏者则每回合给你一张潜伏者卵牌，并命令你的一个没有攻击目标单位的潜伏者出地并前进

en: Add 1 mineral income to your allies that aren't at their limit. Then add 1 to your mineral income. If already at your limit, draw a card and add Crystallized Energy to your hand instead.

cn: 它们在敌方准备区出生
